items.title: Improving MAUI & Xamarin Code Quality with Pre Git Commit Linting
items.description:
This tutorial shows how easy it is to use tools common to other frameworks, to enforce coding standards across all developers on a MAUI/Xamarin mobile app project.

Improving MAUI & Xamarin Code Quality with Pre Git Commit Linting by Saamer Mansoor
items.description_markdown:
This tutorial shows how easy it is to use tools common to other frameworks, to enforce coding standards across all developers on a MAUI/Xamarin mobile app project. 

[**Improving MAUI & Xamarin Code Quality with Pre Git Commit Linting**](https://prototypemakers.medium.com/improving-maui-xamarin-code-quality-with-pre-git-commit-linting-e3e24ce585d9) by [Saamer Mansoor](https://twitter.com/saamerm)

embedded_links.title: **Improving MAUI & Xamarin Code Quality with Pre Git Commit Linting**

items.title: Lazy Load JSON Data in Xamarin.Forms ListView: An Overview
items.description:
This blog teaches you how to show a fixed amount of JSON data on initial loading (lazy load) and show a busy indicator while loading the remaining data on scrolling in the Xamarin.Forms ListView.

Lazy Load JSON Data in Xamarin.Forms ListView: An Overview by Jayaleshwari N
items.description_markdown:
This blog teaches you how to show a fixed amount of JSON data on initial loading (lazy load) and show a busy indicator while loading the remaining data on scrolling in the Xamarin.Forms ListView.

[**Lazy Load JSON Data in Xamarin.Forms ListView: An Overview**](https://www.syncfusion.com/blogs/post/lazy-load-json-data-in-xamarin-forms-listview-an-overview.aspx) by [Jayaleshwari N]()

embedded_links.title: **Lazy Load JSON Data in Xamarin.Forms ListView: An Overview**

items.title: Playing audio in .NET MAUI applications
items.description:
This post covers how we can add the ability to play audio files in our .NET MAUI applications.

Playing audio in .NET MAUI applications by Shaun Lawrence
items.description_markdown:
This post covers how we can add the ability to play audio files in our .NET MAUI applications.

[**Playing audio in .NET MAUI applications**](https://blog.bijington.com/2022/08/23/playing-audio-in-dotnet-maui.html) by [Shaun Lawrence](https://twitter.com/bijington)

items.title: Controlling your Sonos speaker with .NET MAUI
items.description:
This post shows you how you can control your local Sonos speakers using a .NET MAUI application.… Why? Because you can.

Controlling your Sonos speaker with .NET MAUI - Andreas Nesheim by Andreas Nesheim
items.description_markdown:
This post shows you how you can control your local Sonos speakers using a .NET MAUI application.… Why? Because you can.

[**Controlling your Sonos speaker with .NET MAUI - Andreas Nesheim**](https://www.andreasnesheim.no/controlling-your-sonos-speaker-with-net-maui/) by [Andreas Nesheim](https://twitter.com/andreasnesheim)

embedded_links.title: **Controlling your Sonos speaker with .NET MAUI - Andreas Nesheim**

items.description:

items.title: Pub/Sub++ for .NET Apps with MediatR (Request AND Response)
items.description:
This video covers a library called MediatR which supports request/response, commands, queries, notifications and events, synchronous and async with intelligent dispatching via C# generic variance.

Pub/Sub++ for .NET Apps with MediatR (Request AND Response) by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
This video covers a library called MediatR which supports request/response, commands, queries, notifications and events, synchronous and async with intelligent dispatching via C# generic variance.


[**Pub/Sub++ for .NET Apps with MediatR (Request AND Response)**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q0X8RwhMNK4) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/jamesmontemagno)

embedded_links.title: **Pub/Sub++ for .NET Apps with MediatR (Request AND Response)**

items.title: Generate Barcodes in 2 Lines of Code with .NET MAUI
items.description:
Generating barcodes has never been easier than with the ZXing.Net.Maui library! With just 2 lines of code you can generate QR codes and barcodes in all kinds of formats. Watch the video to learn how.

Generate Barcodes in 2 Lines of Code with .NET MAUI by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Generating barcodes has never been easier than with the ZXing.Net.Maui library! With just 2 lines of code you can generate QR codes and barcodes in all kinds of formats. Watch the video to learn how.

[**Generate Barcodes in 2 Lines of Code with .NET MAUI**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p4BRsdMc7OA) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **Generate Barcodes in 2 Lines of Code with .NET MAUI**
